title: Marshall

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Direct visitors from one player to another player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone who attempts to visit your first target will instead visit your second target.
- Both of your targets will be told that they were transported.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid the town of heretics and non believers

desc:
Post 3266
*You are a guard who redirects people to other houses.*
